description.value:
Once you reach 5th level, you gain the following racial trait. 
With a harsh spin of your wings and a release of your smaller, looser feathers, you can create a 5ft twister adjacent to you. The vortex violently spins with sharpened feathers inside for 1 minute or until a large enough gust of wind can disperse it.
Any creature who moves into the vortex’s space on their turn, or else starts their turn inside of it, takes 5d4 slashing damage.
